estate_title: Cozy Family Home in Suburban Neighborhood
description: Charming single-family home with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Spacious backyard perfect for family gatherings. Located in a safe and friendly neighborhood.
Sleek and stylish townhouse featuring 4 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms. Enjoy panoramic city views from the rooftop terrace. Close to downtown amenities and public transportation.
Stunning 2-bedroom apartment with floor-to-ceiling windows offering breathtaking views of the skyline. Amenities include a fitness center, concierge service, and on-site parking.

estate_title: Furnished Student Apartment Near University Campus
description: Fully furnished student apartment with 2 bedrooms and shared amenities including a study lounge and fitness center. Walking distance to the university campus and local cafes.

estate_title: Tranquil Senior Living Community with Assisted Care
description: Peaceful senior living community offering assisted care services. Spacious private rooms and beautiful gardens for residents to enjoy. Weekly social activities and outings.

estate_title: Beachfront Villa for a Relaxing Vacation
description: Luxurious beachfront villa with 5 bedrooms and a private pool. Perfect for a family vacation or group getaway. Stunning ocean views and easy access to nearby attractions.
